tests.name: banner works for formatted msgs
tests.code:
test('banner works for formatted msgs', () =>
  expect(formatAsBanner([
    'hello msg1',
    chalk.yellow('hello msg2'),
    chalk.bold('hello msg3'),
  ])).toEqual([
    '******************',
    '*** hello msg1 ***',
    `*** ${chalk.yellow('hello msg2')} ***`,
    `*** ${chalk.bold('hello msg3')} ***`,
    '******************',
  ]));
